Nkechi Justina Nwaogu, CON bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ, onye nchoputa na CEO Libra Investment
Ọ bụ onye isi oche kansụl ọchịchị gara aga na onye isi ọchịchị nke Mahadum nke Calabar
Senator Nkechi Nwaogu bu onye onye otu na-anọchite anya Osisioma Ngwa, Ugwunagbo na Obingwa Federal Constituency na Federal House of representatives si 2003/2007
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara ya dịka Senator na-anọchite anya Abia Central Senatorial District
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya ọzọ maka oge nke abụọ n'ọfịs.
N'afọ 2016, Nwaogu kwuputara na ya bụ zi onye otu pati na-achị  obodo All Progressives Congress (APC)
Nkechi Nwaogu bụ onye Senator ugboro abụọ na onye isi ochichi nke gara aga na nso Chancellor University of Calabar
Onye na-ahụ maka ego technocrat
Senator Nkechi Justina Nwaogu lụrụ Dr Roland Nwaogu nke ncheta di ngozi
Sinetọ Nkechi Nwaogu kwadoro onwe ya site n'agụmakwụkwọ ziri ezi ma n'ụlọ na mba ofesi
O nwetara Asambodo Ịhapụ Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Mbụ na 1967 na Aba Township School ma mesịa gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Immaculate Heart na 1975
N'ịkwado onwe ya maka ibu ọrụ ka ukwuu, ọ hapụrụ Naijiria gawa Lọndọn ebe ọ nwetara Diploma na Printing Management na London College of Printing, London
Ka ọ na-erule 1981, ọ nwetara nzere Post Graduate Degree na Management Studies (Major na Finance) site na Polytechnic nke South Bank London, bu zi Mahadum nke South London ugbua
N'ịbụ onye na-achọsi ike inwetakwu ihe ọmụma, onye omebe iwu a nwere mmasị gawa na Mahadum Brunel na Oxbridge Middlesex England ebe ọ nwetara M.sc na Management (Major in Finance) na 1984
Ugbu o na achu a nzere Doctorate na nyocha amụma na njikwa ego
N'afọ 2018, o nwetara akara ugo mmụta doctorate na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Nigeria Nsukka
Sinetọ Nkechi Nwaogu kwadoro onwe ya site n'agụmakwụkwọ ziri ezi ma n'ụlọ na mba ofesi
O nwetara Asambodo Ịhapụ Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Mbụ na 1967 na Aba Township School ma mesịa gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Immaculate Heart na 1975
N'ịkwado onwe ya maka ibu ọrụ ka ukwuu, ọ hapụrụ Naijiria gawa Lọndọn ebe ọ nwetara Diploma na Printing Management na London College of Printing, London
Ka ọ na-erule 1981, ọ nwetara nzere Post Graduate Degree na Management Studies (Major in Finance) site na Polytechnic nke South Bank London, Mahadum Ugbu a nke South London
N'ịbụ onye na-achọsi ike inwetakwu ihe ọmụma, onye omebe iwu a nwere mmasị gara na Mahadum Brunel na Oxbridge Middlesex England ebe ọ nwetara M.sc na Management (Major in Finance) na 1984
Ọ na-eme ugbu a nzere Doctorate na nyocha amụma na njikwa ego
N'afọ 2018, o nwetara akara ugo mmụta doctorate na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Nigeria Nsukka
</br>N'ime oge mbụ ya n'ụlọ omebe iwu nke elu, ọ bụ onye isi oche Senate Kọmitii na Banking, Insurance ya na ụlọ ọrụ ego ndi ọzọ
O nwere ike iweghachi nrubeisi na iwu na usoro na ngalaba ego nke mba anyi
N'ọnọdụ ya dị ka onye isi oche, Kọmitii Senate na Gas Resources, ọ kwadoro maka nghọta ka ukwuu, nzaghachi na mmepe ngwa ngwa na ụlọ ọrụ gas nke mba anyi.
Ọ bụbu onye omeiwu ECOWAS site n'afọ 2005 ruo taa ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke West African Region, African Parliamentarian Network Against Corruption, APNAC.
O mere akara mbụ ya na ụwa ego ụlọ ọrụ na England site na 1979 ruo 1987
N'afọ 1987 Nwaogu kwagara Naijiria ka o mechaa otu afọ nke National Youth Service Corp
International Merchant Bank Plc kwadoro ya ozugbo dị ka Credit Analyst
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere Commerce Bank Ltd dị ka osote onye njikwa na emesia ụlọ akụ Diamond dịka onye njikwa alaka

N'ihi mmasị o nwere ime ka ndị ogbenye nọ n'ime ime obodo nweta kredit otuto , o hiwere ụlọ ọrụ Investment Company - Libra Investments Ltd, nke nwere ndekọ ndekọ nke inye ọtụtụ ndị ahịa ime obodo na ndị na-arụ ọrụ nka kredit maka mmepe azụmahịa ha dị iche iche
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2011, Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị Ikpe Naịjiria kagburu ntuli aka Nwaogu mere n'April
A họpụtara Nwaogu ka ọ bụrụ Pro Chancellor na Onyeisi oche Governing Board, University of Calabar
Ihe ndị ọ rụpụtara n'ọkwa ya gụnyere nhọpụta Nwanyi mbụ osote onye isi ala, bụ Ọkammụta Florence Obi
Ọchịagha nke iwu Niger, CON site n'aka onye isi ala mbụ Goodluck Ebele Jonathan
Ugo Nwanyi Ndigbo by Eze Nri.
Nturu ugo onye ndu pụtara ìhè nke International Inner Wheel, Nigeria
Award of Excellence na Community Service site na Rotary Club nke Aba
Award nke nnabata site n'aka ndị inyom Igbo
Ngwa Ambassador by Ngwa Women Cultural Association, Lagos
Nkwenye pụrụ iche sitere n'aka ndị inyom Ngwa nke Los Angeles, California, USA
